item.title: Amy add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Amy add a quote by W.S. Merwin
item.description:
"Separation
Your absence has gone through me Like thread through a needle. Everything I do is stitched with its color." -- W.S. Merwin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Amy add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "this is thy hour o soul, thy free flight into the wordless, away from books, away from art, the day erased, the lesson done, thee fully forth emerging, silent, gazing, pondering the themes thou lovest best, night, sleep, death and the stars." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Amy add a quote by James Russell Lowell
item.description: "By the light of burning martyrs, Christ, thy bleeding feet we track Toiling up new Calv'ries ever with the cross that turns not back New occasions teach new duties, time makes ancient good uncouth We must upward still and onward, who would keep abreast of Truth" -- James Russell Lowell
